triples.name: Bayesian Network
triples.relevance: The survey comprehensively reviews algorithms for learning Bayesian Network structure from data.

triples.name: Graphical Model
triples.relevance: Bayesian Networks are a type of graphical model, central to the paper's focus on network structure discovery.

triples.name: Causality
triples.relevance: The paper addresses causal assumptions when modeling problems and determining Bayesian Network structures.

triples.name: Knowledge Representation and Reasoning
triples.relevance: Bayesian Networks serve as a knowledge representation tool for reasoning under uncertainty in diverse applications.

triples.name: Data Mining
triples.relevance: The paper reviews automated discovery and learning of BN structures from data using data mining techniques.

triples.name: Combinatorial Optimization
triples.relevance: The paper describes 74 combinatoric algorithms for finding optimal Bayesian Network structures.

triples.name: Uncertainty Quantification
triples.relevance: Bayesian Networks are used for quantifying and reasoning under uncertainty across medical and scientific domains.
